definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 39:20 bondman, prisoner (Ar. 0’asiyrun, Aram. 0asiro0, MI [[אסר]])—´[[א]] abs. Ps 79:11, Ps 102:21; pl. [[אֲסִירִם]] Ge 39:22 +, cf. Ju Jdg 16:21, Jdg 16:25 Kt; cstr. [[אֲסִירֵי]] Ps 107:10 +, Ge 39:20 Qr; [[אֲסִירָיו]] Ps 69:34 +, etc.;—Prisoner Ge 39:20, Ge 39:22 (J), elsewhere only poetic; Is 14:17; as having rest in grave from task-master Job 3:18; esp. as obj. of divine compassion Ps 68:7 (‖[[יׇתִיר]]), Ps 69:34 (‖[[אֶבְיוֹן]]); ´[[אֶנְקַת א]] Ps 79:11, Ps 102:21 (both ‖[[בְּנֵי תְמוּתָה]]), Ps 107:10 [[עֳנִי וּבַרְזֶל]] ´[[א]] (‖[[ישְׁבֵי חשֶׁח וְחַלְמָָוֶת]]); cf. [[אָָרֶץ]] ´[[א]] La 3:34; specif. of liberated exiles of Isr. Zec 9:11, called captives of hope [[הַתִּקְוׇה]] ´[[א]] v:Zec 9:12.
